name: investigation_progress
description: Tracks the progress of Detective Graves' investigation in solving the crime.

tags.description: The current stage of the investigation (e.g., initial inquiry, evidence collection, suspect interrogation).

name: evidence_collected
description: Counts the number of pieces of evidence collected during the investigation.

tags.description: Type of evidence collected (e.g., physical, testimonial, digital).

name: suspect_interaction_frequency
description: Monitors how often Detective Graves interacts with each suspect.

tags.description: Name of the suspect being interacted with (e.g., Singer, Driver, Banker).

name: forensic_analysis_time
description: Measures the time taken by the forensic pathologist to analyze evidence.

tags.description: Type of evidence being analyzed (e.g., fingerprint, DNA, weapon).

name: suspect_alibi_strength
description: Evaluates the strength of each suspect's alibi during the investigation.

tags.description: Name of the suspect being evaluated (e.g., Singer, Driver, Banker).

name: lead_follow_up_rate
description: Tracks the rate at which Detective Graves follows up on leads.

tags.description: Status of the lead (e.g., open, closed, ongoing).

name: interrogation_effectiveness
description: Measures the effectiveness of interrogations in obtaining useful information.

tags.description: Name of the suspect being interrogated (e.g., Singer, Driver, Banker).

name: evidence_relevance
description: Assesses the relevance of collected evidence to the crime.

tags.description: Unique identifier for each piece of evidence.

name: suspect_motive_strength
description: Evaluates the strength of each suspect's motive for committing the crime.

tags.description: Name of the suspect being evaluated (e.g., Singer, Driver, Banker).

name: case_resolution_time
description: Measures the total time taken to solve the crime.
